body_html:
I have solved this problem by doing the below command:

sudo cp /usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64/libcurand.so.9.0 /usr/local/lib/libcurand.so.9.0 && sudo ldconfig

then I run the script again and it shows that other libxxxx.so can't not be found, then I did the command above again to copy the libxxxx.so from /usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64/ into /usr/local/lib/
again and again , when I copied several libxxxx.so , then it runs correctly.
I think some libxxxx.so must be in /usr/local/lib so that it can be found
